metadata.title: CVE-2017-14151 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An off-by-one error was discovered in opj_tcd_code_block_enc_allocate_datain lib/openjp2/tcd.c in OpenJPEG 2.2.0. The vulnerability causes anout-of-bounds write, which may lead to remote denial of service (heap-basedbuffer overflow affecting opj_mqc_flush in lib/openjp2/mqc.c andopj_t1_encode_cblk in lib/openjp2/t1.c) or possibly remote code execution.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
